feed.title: File Browser Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.33.10
entry.content:
Changelog

  • da03728cd7319542850e2ea337beec83c168f69c chore(release): 2.33.10
  • e735491c57b12c3b19dd2e4b570723df78f4eb44 fix: ignore linting error
  • 4d830f707fc4314741fd431e70c2ce50cd5a3108 fix: correctly check if command is allowed when using shell
  • f84a6db680b6df1c7c8f06f1816f7e4c9e963668 fix: correctly split shell

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.34.0
entry.content:
Changelog

  • d8472e767bce02b6718411d23c0f27ab1efb7f4d chore(release): 2.34.0
  • 8700cb30ff382cf740f52e695ce5794ff7cfdf09 chore: reuse docker flags
  • 93c4b2e03c5176da01a7e00a03c03ffcce279bc8 fix: abort ongoing requests when changing pages (#3927)
  • 2d1a82b73f351839cbd6dcd5ea5aeb835b363c9d docs: improvements to building and docs (#5234)
  • 5a072913062a6b2b0e5c74a02ca7710218ed3e5e build(deps): bump brace-expansion from 1.1.11 to 1.1.12 in /tools (#5228)
  • 09f679fae43398f5b87d21acc9d974d4d053392f feat: Translate frontend/src/i18n/en.json in fa (#5233)
  • 9e273cd9475d57b9500034e8b341ff8b620bcab8 Revert "docs: change cloudflare environment (#5231)" (#5232)
  • 77d266bc00a12c924146eea2a09de6f9ac5698ab docs: change cloudflare environment (#5231)
  • 8861933cf845b104e072f35e5f37d7c26097c9dc build: publish docs to cloudflare pages (#5230)
  • a5ea2a266bef619d1c4322266d1aa7d397d2c856 feat: update translations for project File Browser (#5226)
  • f5e531c8ae0b9b18717e184856ace0ce19beef82 build: add an arm64 target for the site image (#5229)
  • 6072540c3e571931ee2e54bdedf8f1e987199ac0 docs: migrate to MkDocs for site generation (#5227)
  • 464b644adf22a2178414a6f1e4fa286276de81d2 fix: add configurable minimum password length (#5225)
  • 089255997a653c284cd4249990b58bed00086c61 fix: do not expose the name of the root directory (#5224)
  • 5331969163f5ae1fd2389f665059fc9e4a98db15 build(deps): bump github.com/go-viper/mapstructure/v2 in /tools
  • f32f27383d1fafa074f038cc873bd37b7f20ee27 build(deps): bump github.com/go-viper/mapstructure/v2
  • 0acd69c537ce2909ff62c4bb6980982524ece221 feat: Translate frontend/src/i18n/en.json in fa
  • ae4fb0ea2593a18e3b8ea159538150405d80c87a chore: make as exception to mnd
  • 8230eb7ab51ccbd00b03f5b9d6964fa4aae331d4 fix: Graceful shutdown
  • 8b8fb3343f8fb7973870e6d6e423acf2ac889bb5 ci: remove goconst
  • 1d494ff3159ef939cfb4980ccde6f27df3e738b5 build: bump golangci-lint to 2.1.6

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.34.1
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 70d59ec03ed3fa9c99cf9151037367a534559145 chore(release): 2.34.1
  • bf37f88c32222ad9c186482bb97338a9c9b4a93c fix: passthrough the minimum password length (#5236)
  • 7354eb6cf966244141277c2808988855c004f908 fix: exclude to-be-moved folder from move dialog (#5235)
  • 10684e5390f10815e70ad72d2e23cf7e599c6d0a docs: bring the maintenance warning higher in the page
  • 58fe81734931c3453f328f765fd1ad4258b1ccce docs: add link to contributing and license in readme

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.34.2
entry.content:
Changelog

  • d1a73a8b18e15aec7febe661dc51ff0da56c5170 chore(release): 2.34.2
  • 2b5d6cbb996a61a769acc56af0acc12eec2d8d8f fix: mitigate unprotected shares
  • 364f391017628adb09d70e77dfb3092227403e9d docs: cleanup installation
  • c13861e13cc183e72a029cb0af9885b412e466db docs: clarify admin password
  • e6b750add5d2f3b899b335bba133cfc9681cf38c chore: make more fields in bug report mandatory

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.35.0
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 8ef8f2c09803fe5d75c673e7c7fe2d5595c3f9c3 chore(release): 2.35.0
  • 3b3df83d648c0156ee09d33f695acefda58af404 docs: add warning to command runner
  • 38d0366acf88352b5a9a97c45837b0f865efae0b fix: update documentation links
  • 4403cd35720dbda5a8bb1013b92582accf3317bc fix: shell value must be joined by blank space
  • 8d7522049ced83f28f0933b55772c32e3ad04627 feat: Long press selects item in single click mode
  • 7b43cfb1dcb6fd831f2384205d58278bf1f2eed7 docs: improve fail2ban filter
  • d644744417f6d3b3ad2a55dbab5f4313f78c6e5f docs: add fail2ban instructions
